sentences.sContent: The teacher lunched several students at his home.
sentences.sContent_eng: The teacher lunched several students at his home.
sentences.sCn: 老师请几个学生在他家吃午饭。

sentences.sContent: We export tractors from the East Coast to several African countries.
sentences.sContent_eng: We export tractors from the East Coast to several African countries.
sentences.sCn: 我们从东海岸向好几个非洲国家出口拖拉机。

sentences.sContent: The integrated country will rend into several independent regions sooner or later.
sentences.sContent_eng: The integrated country will rend into several independent regions sooner or later.
sentences.sCn: 那个完整的国家早晚会分裂成几个独立的地区。
